solution_line_template: That means he writes {pages_per_week_short_stories}*{weeks_per_year}=<<{pages_per_week_short_stories}*{weeks_per_year}={pages_per_year_short_stories}>>{pages_per_year_short_stories} pages of short stories a year
So he writes {pages_per_year_short_stories}+{pages_per_novel_year}=<<{pages_per_year_short_stories}+{pages_per_novel_year}={total_pages_per_year}>>{total_pages_per_year} pages a year
So he needs {total_pages_per_year}/{pages_per_sheet}=<<{total_pages_per_year}/{pages_per_sheet}={sheets_per_year}>>{sheets_per_year} sheets of paper
That means he needs {sheets_per_year}/{sheets_per_ream}=<<{sheets_per_year}/{sheets_per_ream}={reams_needed_per_year}>>{reams_needed_per_year} reams of paper
